data.name: GetAllPatientTransactions
data.value: SELECT SUM(c.Amount) AS TotalAmount, a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks FROM PatientTransactions a JOIN Patients b on a.PatientId=b.Id JOIN ServiceTransactions c on a.Id = c.PatientTransactionId GROUP BY a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks HAVING a.PatientId = @PatientId ORDER BY a.CreateDate DESC

data.name: GetAllPatientUnpaidTransactions
data.value: SELECT SUM(c.Amount) AS TotalAmount, a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks FROM PatientTransactions a JOIN Patients b on a.PatientId=b.Id JOIN ServiceTransactions c on a.Id = c.PatientTransactionId GROUP BY a.Id, a.PatientId, a.RefDocId, a.DepositAmount, a.SampleRequired, a.SampleReceived, a.SampleNumber, a.BillGenerated, a.CreateDate, a.Remarks HAVING a.PatientId = @PatientId AND a.BillGenerated = 0 ORDER BY a.CreateDate DESC

data.name: GetAllTransactionListByDate
data.value: select a.Id as ServiceTransactionId, b.Id as PatientTransactionId, cast(b.CreateDate as Date) as CreateDate, b.PatientId, d.CategoryName,c.Name as ServiceName, b.SampleNumber, e.FirstName + ' ' + e.Lastname as PatientName, f.Name as ReportStatus, f.Id as ReportStatusId from ServiceTransactions a JOIN PatientTransactions b ON a.PatientTransactionId = b.Id JOIN Services c ON a.ServiceID = c.Id JOIN ServiceCategory d on c.CategoryId = d.Id JOIN Patients e ON b.PatientId = e.Id JOIN ReportStatus f ON a.ReportStatusId = f.Id where cast(b.CreateDate as Date) >= @FromDate and cast(b.CreateDate as date) <= @ToDate and a.ReportStatusId = coalesce(nullif(@ReportStatus, 0), a.ReportStatusId)

data.name: GetBillNoForTransction
data.value: select value from Settings where Name='BillPrefix'

data.name: GetDepositeAmountById
data.value: select DepositAmount from PatientTransactions where Id=@Id

data.name: GetPatientTransactionsById
data.value: SELECT c.Id as ServiceTransaction_Id, b.Id as ServiceTransaction_ServiceId,a.CategoryName as ServiceTransaction_SCategory,b.Name as ServiceTransaction_SName,b.Amount as ServiceTransaction_SAmount,C.PatientTransactionId AS Service_PatientTransactionId FROM ServiceCategory a,Services b,ServiceTransactions c where c.PatientTransactionId=@TransactionsId AND A.Id=B.CategoryId AND B.Id=C.ServiceID

data.name: GetPatientTransctionForBill
data.value: select b.Id,b.CreateDate as TransactionDate,c.Name as ServiceName,b.Amount,b.PatientTransactionId from PatientTransactions a join ServiceTransactions b on a.Id=b.PatientTransactionId join Services c on c.Id=b.ServiceID where a.BillGenerated=0 and a.Id=@Id

data.name: SavePatientServices
data.value: INSERT INTO ServiceTransactions(ServiceID, Amount, PatientTransactionId, CreateDate, CreateBy,ReportStatusId) VALUES(@ServiceID, @Amount, @PatientTransactionId, @CreateDate,@CreateBy,@ReportStatusId); SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: SavePatientTransction
data.value: INSERT INTO PatientTransactions(DepositAmount, SampleRequired, SampleReceived, SampleNumber,BillGenerated,RefDocId, PatientId,CreateDate, CreateBy,Remarks,ReportStatusId) VALUES(@DepositAmount,@SampleRequired, @SampleReceived, @SampleNumber,@BillGenerated, @RefDocId, @PatientId, @CreateDate, @CreateBy,@Remarks,@ReportStatusId) ; SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: UpdateBillNoForTransction
data.value: update Settings set Value=@Value where Name='BillPrefix'

data.name: UpdatePatientServices
data.value: UPDATE ServiceTransactions SET ServiceID=@ServiceID, Amount=@Amount, PatientTransactionId=@PatientTransactionId, UpdateDate=@UpdateDate, UpdateBy=@UpdateBy , ReportStatusId = @ReportStatusId WHERE Id=@Id; SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: UpdatePatientServicess
data.value: UPDATE ServiceTransactions SET ServiceID=@ServiceID, Amount=@Amount, PatientTransactionId=@PatientTransactionId, UpdateDate=@UpdateDate, UpdateBy=@UpdateBy ; SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: UpdatePatientTransaction
data.value: UPDATE PatientTransactions SET DepositAmount=@DepositAmount, SampleRequired=@SampleRequired , SampleReceived=@SampleReceived, SampleNumber=@SampleNumber, BillGenerated=@BillGenerated, RefDocId=@RefDocId,PatientId=@PatientId, UpdateDate=@UpdateDate, UpdateBy=@UpdateBy , Remarks=@Remarks WHERE Id=@Id; SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: UpdateServiceTransaction
